item.title: Let's Talk Kubernetes Ingress
item.description: If you don’t know what Kubernetes is, I highly suggest to look into it. It’s a container orchestration system that runs anywhere. In short, it takes the simple but powerful concept of a containerized application (popularized by docker), and ramps it up to web scale levels. It allows you to deploy and manage hundreds or thousands of contaners without the pain of managing the VM and OS layers assocated with a normal deployment.
